rootCause: Whitespace crept back into the moustache placeholders for the sugarkube CLI recipes, so the docs, nvme-health, start-here, and token-place just commands no longer matched the guard rails in their tests and caused pytest failures.
resolution: Normalized the justfile recipes to call "{{sugarkube_cli}}" and forward START_HERE_ARGS without surrounding spaces so the CLI helper is detected and argument passthrough stays intact.
